title: Reus [R.G. Mechanics] 1.3.0
description:
Version 1.3.0
Latest version (at least until now, 25.07.2014)

This version from R.G. Mechanics saves your achievements in the installation folder:
*install folder*3DMGAME3DMGAMEstatsachievements.ini
The file is generated at the first launch of the game with all achievements unlocked. if you want to start the game from scratch, all you have to do is edit the .ini and change all the 1010 entries to 0000.


Savegames and the configuration file are saved in: My DocumentsReus


The GOG version saved achievements as well save
games and configs in a file in:
My DocumentsReus

Unfortunately, I haven't found a GOG version updated to 1.3.0

I got it from here:
